A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The plot holes are terrible. The writer for this film seems to be at odds with the writer of the previous. There was no viable  explanation why a son would kill his father that would Inspire the heroines support of the villain. The back and forth between serious moments and bad comedy robbed from what could have been real story building scenes. I could go on but needless to say I saw little if anything redeeming about this trash.
